info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 1:25AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT... WEATHER... * Light snow with embedded moderate lake effect snow showers will persist early this morning. * Hourly snowfall rates between a half-inch to three-quarters of an inch will be possible through 5 AM with any of the localized stronger lake effect snow showers. * Highly fluctuating visibilities down to a half-mile or less will be possible within the embedded snow shower activity. * Air temperatures will range between 18 and 20 degrees. IMPACTS... * Accumulating snow will lead to slippery roads, particularly on bridges, exit ramps and overpasses. * Moderate snow showers will bring a reduction in visibility down to a half-mile or less at times. && PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... * Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP
